articles.author: Khanyiso Tshwaku
articles.title: 'Form is temporary' as Rossouw comes good with decisive semi-final contribution
articles.description: Pretoria Capitals batter Rilee Rossouw admitted the well-worn cricket truism of 'form being temporary and class being permanent' is a cliché, but one that's applicable to him.
articles.content:
• Pretoria Capitals batter Rilee Rossouw relied on his class to pull through what has been a tough SA20.
  • After a string of extended low scores, he made 56 in the Capitals' 29-run win ag… [+3140 chars]

articles.title: What we learned from watching the 1992 World Cup final in full again | ESPNcricinfo.com
articles.description: Wides, lbw calls, swing - plenty of things were different in white-ball cricket back then | ESPNcricinfo.com
articles.content: Last week, we at ESPNcricinfo did something we have been thinking of doing for eight years now: pretend-live ball-by-ball commentary for a classic cricket match. We knew the result, yes, but we tried… [+6823 chars]
